titles.title: A resolution to reauthorize and redesignate the Senate Arms Control Observer Group.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends S. Res. 86, agreed to February 18, 1985, to reauthorize and redesignate the Senate Arms Control Observer Group to act during the 100th Congress as official observers at any formal arms reduction or control negotiations. Provides for appointments to such group by the Majority Leader and the Minority Leader. Sets forth administrative provisions relating to travel and expenses.
